duties_responsibilities.duty: Adhere to a tight general ledger month-end close process.
Prepare and generate critical month-end allocations and/or advices.
Maintain and reconcile general ledger account balances monthly, including all intra-company payables and receivables.
Focus on process improvements over the general close and intra-company process.
Reconcile and analyze balance sheet accounts in compliance with a strict deadline.
Assist with internal control evaluations and modify and document accounting control procedures.
Conduct investigations and resolve critical month-end complex reconciliations.
Provide support to compliance and auditors, including significant research, data mining/reports, and resolution of finance systems questions as required.
Perform other duties, assignments, and special projects as required.
Assist the Cost and General Ledger Manager on projects as needed.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in accounting or related discipline (CPA designation preferred)
